You guys, follow me!\""},{"lineNumber":192359,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かった！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Got it!"},{"lineNumber":192360,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこ行くの、にーちゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where are we going, big bro!?\""},{"lineNumber":192361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オレにも分からん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even I don't know!\""},{"lineNumber":192362,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなた達は元就についていき、","translatedEnglishLine":"You followed Motonari,"},{"lineNumber":192363,"originalJapaneseLine":"村の裏山についた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and arrived at the hill behind the village."},{"lineNumber":192364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、この果物は！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, this fruit!"},{"lineNumber":192365,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、見ろ！　レリコフ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, look! Relikov!\""},{"lineNumber":192366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にーちゃん、にーちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big bro, big bro."},{"lineNumber":192367,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ食べられるの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can we eat this?\""},{"lineNumber":192368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「食えん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You can't eat it!\""},{"lineNumber":192369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが清濁併せ呑む大人になれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But become an adult who can accept both purity and impurity!"},{"lineNumber":192370,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というわけで食えなくても食え！","translatedEnglishLine":"So even if you can't eat it, eat it!"},{"lineNumber":192371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　腹に飲み下して消化しろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Swallow it down and digest it!\""},{"lineNumber":192372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんな風になァ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like this!"},{"lineNumber":192373,"originalJapaneseLine":"　はぐはぐ、ガツガツ！　んぐぐぐ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Nom nom, chomp chomp! Nngh!\""},{"lineNumber":192374,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アハハハハ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":192375,"originalJapaneseLine":"　美味しくないね、これ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This isn't tasty, is it!\""},{"lineNumber":192376,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははは！　そうだろう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha! That's right!\""},{"lineNumber":192377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだこの会話……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What kind of conversation is this...?\""},{"lineNumber":192378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次はどこに行くの、にーちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where to next, big bro?\""},{"lineNumber":192379,"originalJapaneseLine":"「腹ごしらえがしたいのう！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to get some food in my stomach!\""},{"lineNumber":192380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":192381,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐへへへへ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ghehehehe..."},{"lineNumber":192382,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガキだけでこんな所にいちゃ危ないぜぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's dangerous for just kids to be around a place like this.\""},{"lineNumber":192383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おじさん達みたいな奴隷商人の人さらいに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You could get attacked by slave traders like these guys,"},{"lineNumber":192384,"originalJapaneseLine":"　襲われるからなぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"kidnappers!\""},{"lineNumber":192385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":192386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いい腹ごなしだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What a great way to work up an appetite!\""},{"lineNumber":192387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わーーーーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wheee!\""},{"lineNumber":192388,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あれ……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, that...?\""},{"lineNumber":192389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、ちょ！　お前ら、ストーーップ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait! You guys, stoooop!\""},{"lineNumber":192390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやー、お手柄だよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, that's quite the feat."},{"lineNumber":192391,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この奴隷商人の人さらい達を","translatedEnglishLine":"You've caught these slave-trading kidnappers,"},{"lineNumber":192392,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捕まえてくれるなんて」","translatedEnglishLine":"really impressive!\""},{"lineNumber":192393,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははは！　口ほどにもなかったな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha! You weren't as good as your talk suggested!\""},{"lineNumber":192394,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねーねー、にーちゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey hey, big bro!"},{"lineNumber":192395,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はどこに行く！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where to next!?\""},{"lineNumber":192396,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっはははは！　そうだなぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha! Well then!\""},{"lineNumber":192397,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、この二人……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"These two..."},{"lineNumber":192398,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あっちへフラフラ、こっちへウロウロ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"staggering over there, wandering around here...\""},{"lineNumber":192399,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、相棒……そろそろ帰った方が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, partner... we should probably head back soon...\""},{"lineNumber":192400,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、怖い……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, scary..."},{"lineNumber":192401,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それって危険なんでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"That sounds dangerous, doesn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":192402,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、最近この近くで見つかった迷宮……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that labyrinth that was found nearby recently..."},{"lineNumber":192403,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中には魔物も結構いるらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, there are quite a few monsters inside."},{"lineNumber":192404,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早く警備隊がなんとかしてくれりゃあいいが……","translatedEnglishLine":"Hopefully, the guards will do something about it soon...\""},{"lineNumber":192405,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"............\""},{"lineNumber":192406,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ククク……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehehe...\""},{"lineNumber":192407,"originalJapaneseLine":"ニタァーっと元就が危険な笑みを浮かべた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Motonari grinned dangerously with a sly smile."},{"lineNumber":192408,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、やだ……嫌な予感……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no... I have a bad feeling...\""},{"lineNumber":192409,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":192410,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":192411,"originalJapaneseLine":"とある地下迷宮――","translatedEnglishLine":"A certain underground labyrinth—"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 買い出しに付き合ってて暇なんだー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm just tagging along on the shopping run and I'm bored."
"Well, we're just taking a walk too,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この中でオレが一番年上だな！」
よし！　お前ら、オレについてこい！」
どこ行くの、にーちゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where are we going, big bro!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は元就についていき、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and arrived at the hill behind the village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、見ろ！　レリコフ！」
「だが清濁併せ呑む大人になれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But become an adult who can accept both purity and impurity!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というわけで食えなくても食え！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So even if you can't eat it, eat it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 腹に飲み下して消化しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Swallow it down and digest it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はぐはぐ、ガツガツ！　んぐぐぐ！」
「ぐわっははは！　そうだろう！」
「次はどこに行くの、にーちゃん」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to get some food in my stomach!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガキだけでこんな所にいちゃ危ないぜぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's dangerous for just kids to be around a place like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おじさん達みたいな奴隷商人の人さらいに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You could get attacked by slave traders like these guys,
What a great way to work up an appetite!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちょ、ちょ！　お前ら、ストーーップ！」
この奴隷商人の人さらい達を
捕まえてくれるなんて」
「ぐわっははは！　口ほどにもなかったな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha! You weren't as good as your talk suggested!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐわっはははは！　そうだなぁ！」
あっちへフラフラ、こっちへウロウロ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: staggering over there, wandering around here..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、相棒……そろそろ帰った方が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, partner... we should probably head back soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それって危険なんでしょう？」
「ああ、最近この近くで見つかった迷宮……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, that labyrinth that was found nearby recently...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中には魔物も結構いるらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, there are quite a few monsters inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く警備隊がなんとかしてくれりゃあいいが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hopefully, the guards will do something about it soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニタァーっと元就が危険な笑みを浮かべた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Motonari grinned dangerously with a sly smile.
"Ah, no... I have a bad feeling..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早く警備隊がなんとかしてくれりゃあいいが……
